thread.title: Boldin, Hyde will play vs. Seahawks; Hayne is inactive
thread.title_full: Boldin, Hyde will play vs. Seahawks; Hayne is inactive - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Eric Branch
title: Boldin, Hyde will play vs. Seahawks; Hayne is inactive
text: Wide receiver Anquan Boldin will make his 39th straight start tonight against the Seahawks despite a hamstring injury that made him questionable on the injury report.
